actions.text: Amendment SA 2261 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Amendment SA 2261 proposed by Senator Grassley to Amendment SA 2233. (consideration: CR S278) To extend transfers of excess pension assets to retiree health accounts, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2261 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2261 proposed by Senator Grassley to Amendment SA 2233.

amends_amendment.purpose: Substitute amendment to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 and the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to temporarily change the determination of the interest rate used for funding and other purposes from use of the 30-year treasury bond rate to a composite corporate bond rate, and for other purposes.

purpose: To extend transfers of excess pension assets to retiree health accounts, and for other purposes.
